replies.body:
Well here we go again. Aussies only though.

Uni students are a burden on the Australian budget as I have said before. They borrow money and 80% of the bludgers never pay the money back to the tax payers.

Us common folk have not much choice but to work as we need to live and these Uni guys get a nearly free ride to riches awesome? Wait!! Off our backs though, you know the poor people of Australia.

I have seen a lot of these Uni guys and girls and they party, take drugs and etc....... They just get given their shit and look at us common folk and laugh at us. This is true I know, know you say! Yes they say to me and others hey man I have a Uni degree you don't know what the fuckk you talking about! Hhhuu talking about? I have been doing this job for 10 years I know what I'm doing. No you don't I went to Uni idot!

Look Uni people will carry on about this but at the end of the day TAX PAYERS ARE PAYING THIER FOR THIER ED.

I imagine like the last time you tried to state your opinion, you not only stated incorrect facts to prove your argument but also can't make a coherent statement.

We can tell you haven't been to uni, nor have you passed year 12; but enough poking at the low hanging fruit. 

You got any statistics about that 80% of uni students borrow money that they'll never repay? I can prove this next point too; not all university students party, take drugs or even drink, mostly because that shit costs money that we don't have. Maybe there is a reason why our favourite pass time is a free to play game. :thinking:

So please become a little more educated the next time you try to ruin the fun of our community.
Guys, his bronze 5 with 145 games, cut him some slack :)
Maybe you should have tried harder at school and gone too.
fuck me dead dude, how big is the rod up your ass??

Roses are red
Violets are blue
Life is tough
You'll get through

No wonder you're so against university and education, you can't even construct a sentence. 

Students pay tax as well and to say all uni students party, take drugs and etc is completely ignorant and such an incorrect stereotype.

You're as dumb as dog sh... Don't talk when 1. You can't construct a sentence and 2. When you have no idea what you're talking about.

you're an idiot.

no one's stopping you from going to uni, would you rather a system where only the rich go to uni? 
you chose to go get a job instead of uni.

yeah, the tax payer lends a loan so they can study, but it's socialism. don't like it? fuck off to America

what's this 'common people' stuff? you're talking yourself down, sounds like you're just upset you couldn't get into uni. but maybe if you did, you'd get the pole out of your arse.

the average tax payer is probably also paying for you too, so go read a book or something

You forget that the result of Uni graduates having better paid jobs and therefore a higher income later in life(once all those loans are paid back), is that they end up paying more tax. 
So you could say that the Australian budget relies on them.

And I don't know where you're seeing all of these 'Uni guys and girls' (when you're out partying etc. maybe?) but if you knew any Uni students you'd know that most of them don't have the time or money to go out that often. 
You're probably seeing all the young 'common folk' who have full time jobs and can afford to go out a lot.

Wow, why do you hate fun so much?

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}} 

Going out and getting shitfaced is something only a fraction of uni students do. The rest are working their asses off trying to graduate while paying bills or keeping a job that they're trying to use to pay off debt. We know who's paying for our education. Would you rather the American model, where we have to save since birth to have a chance at university? No, neither would I. 

And hey, university is stressful!! That's why clubs like these E-Sports clubs exist, to make campus life a little less stressful and a more positive experience. Sure there's parties and whatever, but there's also stuff like anime clubs, dancing clubs, hiking clubs, sporting events with sister schools. 

You made your choice to work instead of going to uni- that's fine, but don't shit on the folks who go to uni to try and achieve a better quality of life and get a better job through getting a degree. How do you think we have Doctors? Or Lawyers? Ever think about that before you spat the dummy?

Get your petty, jealous bullshit out of here. Please and thank you.
